所有类

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    Actor
    Parent class that define the objects (animal and obstacles) in the game Provide the method to check if two object crash Provide interface of action for each sub class AnimalBackgroundDigitEndImageLogObstacleTurtleWetTurtle
    Animal
    The animal which the player controls
    BackgroundImage
    Beckground image
    Data
    The defined data type for rank function to store the rank permanent rank
    Digit
    The digits that are showed on the screen
    EasySetting
    The game setting and display of the easy mode Making use of singleton design pattern to ensure the only access in one round
    End
    The terminal that animals need to achieve if player wants to pass the game
    GameOverController
    Controller for game over page
    GameWinController
    Controller for page if the player pass the game
    HardSetting
    The game setting and display of the normal mode Making use of singleton design pattern to ensure the only access in one round
    Image
    A inmage with position
    Log
    Log object to stand the frog
    Main  
    MenuController
    Controller for main menu Provide entrances to other pages SettingPageControllerModePageControllerRankPageControllerTwoPlayer
    ModePageController
    Provide entrance to every mode of 1P game EasySettingNormalSettingHardSetting
    MyStage
    Determine the background setting of the game
    NameController
    Controller of Name page Store and get the name of each player
    NormalSetting
    The game setting and display of the normal mode Making use of singleton design pattern to ensure the only access in one round
    Obstacle
    Obstacle of the game
    Process
    Describe the process of game and control its start and end Constructor takes string mode to determine which mode to execute Making use of singleton pattern to ensure the only access in one round
    Rank
    Rank class makes use of Data type to store the rank data
    RankPageController
    Controller of rank page Provide the rank of each mode
    SettingPageController
    Controller for Setting page Provide choice for player to adjust the life of each round of game
    Show
    This class contain the method to display gaming information on screen
    Turtle
    Turtle to stand the animal
    TwoPlayer
    The game setting and display of the 2P mode Making use of singleton design pattern to ensure the only access in one round
    TwoPWinController
    Controller of winner page in 2P mode
    WetTurtle
    Wet turtle object to stand the frog The wet turtle can go down into water
    World
    Determine the background setting of the game parent class of MyStage
